nodes.bodyText: This is now checked with integration test, there is no exception thrown nor visible when executing with unsupported versions.

nodes.bodyText: How can we make sure we're always testing against the latest spring version as they get released? Maybe use a version range here or update the spring version via dependabot?
We can use version ranges with Ivy, I've changed the version 5.3.0 in the integration test to use that, and as a result it's currently testing with version 5.3.1.
